node.tutorial_arrival_beach.text: Chalk lines and gentle lanterns mark a sheltered cove carved out for newcomers. Soft surf mutes the hum of distant hubs while practice arches shimmer within view.
node.tutorial_arrival_beach.title: First-Step Cove
node.tutorial_arrival_beach.choice.1.tex: Test the signal lantern to open the controls overlay.
node.tutorial_arrival_beach.choice.2.tex: [Hint] Movement is just choosing a numbered option or pressing Enter.
node.tutorial_controls_overlay.text:
Movement: press the number beside a choice or hit Enter for the first option.
Interact: choices marked with tags or resources will note what they spend.
Overlays: I opens inventory, T shows tags and traits, P pauses, and Q quits to desktop.
node.tutorial_controls_overlay.title: Controls Overlay
Close the overlay and return to the cove.
Head inland to practice what you learned.
node.tutorial_hint_movement.text: Pick numbered options to travel between nodes. The leftmost choice is always 1, and pressing Enter repeats the first option so you can move even without lifting your hand from the keyboard.
node.tutorial_hint_movement.title: Movement Prompt
node.tutorial_hint_movement.choice.1.tex: Open the controls overlay for the full list.
node.tutorial_clearing.text: A braided clearing waits inland, stocked with communal supplies and a patient listening stone. Lanterns pulse encouragement toward the workshop and the arch back to the docks.
node.tutorial_clearing.title: Practice Clearing
node.tutorial_clearing.choice.1.text: Listen to the responding stone beacon.
node.tutorial_clearing.choice.2.text: Examine the braiding loom under the canopy.
node.tutorial_clearing.choice.3.text: [Hint] Items you pick up appear in your inventory overlay (press I).
node.tutorial_clearing.choice.4.text: Walk the loop back toward the landing cove.
node.tutorial_clearing.choice.5.text: Complete your training and venture into the wider world.
node.tutorial_hint_resource.text: Press I anytime to open your inventory overlay and confirm what you have gathered. Resources listed there feed into choices that ask for items, so you can check before committing.
node.tutorial_hint_resource.title: Inventory Prompt
node.tutorial_hint_resource.choice.1.tex: Open the controls overlay for more reminders.
node.tutorial_listening_stone.text: The stone hums with a gentle chord, lighting sigils whenever you tap it. Each response mirrors how story flags will echo through later hubs.
node.tutorial_listening_stone.title: Responding Stone
node.tutorial_listening_stone.choice.0.t: Match the rhythm and feel the response ripple back.
node.tutorial_listening_stone.choice.1.t: [Hint] Flags you set show up under the FLAGS summary (press T).
node.tutorial_hint_interact.text: The summary line at the bottom of each screen lists FLAGS you've set so far. Press T to review them in detail and understand how earlier interactions unlocked new choices.
node.tutorial_hint_interact.title: Flag Prompt
node.tutorial_workbench.text: A portable loom waits with diagrams on how to weave gathered seeds into helpful anklets. The pattern promises your first upgrade if you follow it through.
node.tutorial_workbench.title: Braiding Loom
node.tutorial_workbench.choice.0.text: Weave the memory seed into a Light-Step anklet.
node.tutorial_workbench.choice.1.text: Test the anklet around the clearing.
node.tutorial_hint_upgrade.text: Press T to review your Tags and Traits. Newly earned upgrades like Light-Step appear there and unlock extra routes in later hubs.
node.tutorial_hint_upgrade.title: Upgrade Prompt
node.tutorial_exit_gate.text: A calm arch braided with guest-law sigils waits for travelers who complete the loop. Lanterns confirm your new anklet hum before aligning a path toward the Startways.
node.tutorial_exit_gate.title: Guest-Law Exit Arch
node.tutorial_exit_gate.choice.0.text: Step through to the Startways Nexus.
node.tutorial_exit_gate.choice.1.text: Review the controls overlay before leaving.
node.tutorial_exit_gate.choice.2.text: Stay on the island for more practice.
node.sky_docks.text: Stormglass piers sway above the mist; signal-kites rattle as Aeol Nests wardens chant the day's winds. Prism Cartel runners hustle cargo while seed-compass couriers flash Startways sigils.
node.sky_docks.title: Sky-Spliced Docks
node.sky_docks.choice.0.text: (Emissary) Flash envoy seals to the Aeol warden for priority clearance.
node.sky_docks.choice.1.text: (Sneaky) Ride a cargo hoist between patrol sweeps.
node.sky_docks.choice.2.text: Volunteer as a docket runner until your name is called.
node.sky_docks.choice.3.text: (Light-Step) Skip along taut mooring cables to the maintenance lift.
node.sky_docks.choice.4.text: (People-Reader) Mirror the warden's gestures to slide ahead quietly.
node.sky_docks.choice.5.text: Follow a seed-compass courier toward the Startways Nexus.
node.sky_docks.choice.6.text: Accept the Aeol rota posting and settle into the mooring office.
node.sky_docks.choice.7.text: Sign on as the rainchain hostel steward and keep the bunks humming.
node.sky_docks.choice.8.text: [URGENT] Report to Startways Central Command about the crisis
node.root_tangle_market.text: Living terraces coil around the Assembly tree, thrumming with petitioners and spice-sellers. Songbirds carry living-law updates from branch to branch.
node.root_tangle_market.title: Root Assembly Market
node.root_tangle_market.choice.0.text: (Arbiter) Audit the travel ledgers to secure a formal hearing slot.
node.root_tangle_market.choice.1.text: (Weaver) Braid stabilizing cords for the speaking dais, impressing the clerks.
node.root_tangle_market.choice.2.text: 'Everyone's so tense... let me understand what's really happening here.' — Compile testimony for the clerks.
node.root_tangle_market.choice.3.text: Submit your compiled testimony for a guest-law docket.
node.root_tangle_market.choice.4.text: (People-Reader) Whisper the judge's likely ruling to the crowd, earning a Freehands escort.
node.root_tangle_market.choice.5.text: (Emissary) Rally Aeol outriders to ferry you toward the Cloud-Burrow warrens.
node.root_tangle_market.choice.6.text: (Emissary) Broker a prism exchange to ride their courier lane into the galleria.
node.root_tangle_market.choice.7.text: Spend a root-writ to fast-track your guest-law hearing docket.
node.root_tangle_market.choice.8.text: Trade a favor for a Freehands glider run toward the Saltglass engines.
node.root_tangle_market.choice.9.text: (Root Assembly 1+) Call in Assembly trust to open the caretaker lift.
node.root_tangle_market.choice.11.text: File your steward rota and take the first shift yourself.
node.root_tangle_market.choice.12.text: Close the petitions early and audit the night ledgers yourself.
node.root_tangle_market.choice.13.text: [CRISIS RESPONSE] Head to Startways Nexus for emergency briefing
node.prism_galleria.text: Mirrored arcades refract the afternoon into ribbons while Cartel stewards trade favors under crystal awnings. Hovering heliostats hum as apprentices tune their beams.
node.prism_galleria.title: Prism Cartel Galleria
node.prism_galleria.choice.0.text: (Tinkerer) Resequence a cracked heliostat for Cartel credit.
node.prism_galleria.choice.1.text: (Cartographer) Plot the shifting aisles into a precise maintenance route.
node.prism_galleria.choice.2.text: Sign a Cartel marker pledging future service for elevator access.
node.prism_galleria.choice.3.text: (Light-Step) Balance along the suspension cables to the service lift.
node.prism_galleria.choice.4.text: (People-Reader) Read the steward's tells to secure a discreet escort.
node.prism_galleria.choice.5.text: (Emissary) Broker a chime-lift lane into the Cloud-Burrow warrens.
node.prism_galleria.choice.6.text: (Emissary) Escort Prism proofs directly to the guest-law chamber.
node.prism_galleria.choice.7.text: Spend a color baffle to signal the Saltglass engine's prism pier.
node.prism_galleria.choice.8.text: Trade a windbone token for a stewarded lift back to the Startways.
node.prism_galleria.choice.9.text: (Prism Cartel 1+) Invoke Cartel patronage for a private tram to the grotto.
node.prism_galleria.choice.10.text: (Resonant) Harmonize the galleria chimes to open the Cloud-Burrow transfer.
node.prism_galleria.choice.11.text: Post your maintenance rota as a public cooperative and oversee the shift.
node.prism_galleria.choice.12.text: Convert your private tram clearance into a shared steward shift and stay on.
node.prism_galleria.choice.13.text: Trade your pledge for the night lift roster and settle behind the desk.
node.prism_galleria.choice.14.text: Publish the prism light commons pact linking lifts to guest-law routes.
node.prism_galleria.choice.15.text: Take the maintenance stairs to the upper prism workshops.
node.prism_galleria.choice.16.text: Follow the service corridor toward the central hub.
node.guestlaw_chamber.text: Root-braided benches cradle envoys beneath a canopy of verdict sigils. Voices resonate through living wood as the Assembly convenes a pivotal hearing.
node.guestlaw_chamber.title: Guest-Law Chamber
node.guestlaw_chamber.choice.0.text: (Arbiter) Ratify the guest-law compact for all hubs.
node.guestlaw_chamber.choice.1.text: Spend a prism shard to flood the dais with undeniable proof.
node.guestlaw_chamber.choice.2.text: Defer the hearing to rally Prism Cartel support.
node.guestlaw_chamber.choice.3.text: (People-Reader) Expose a hidden clause tying the Court to the Freehands.
node.guestlaw_chamber.choice.4.text: (Light-Step) Slip along the balcony to spy on the Prism delegation's exit route.
node.luminous_grotto.text: Sunken prisms diffuse twilight into rippling curtains while Freehands skiffs bob in hidden coves. Bioluminescent roots mark half-forgotten escape canals.
node.luminous_grotto.title: Luminous Grotto
node.luminous_grotto.choice.0.text: (Lumenar) Bend the lightwells to reveal a hidden canal and sail free.
node.luminous_grotto.choice.1.text: (Healer) Tend to the wounded Freehands and earn their pledged skiff.
node.luminous_grotto.choice.2.text: Cash in a favor to hire a pilot through the gloom.
node.luminous_grotto.choice.3.text: Stash supplies among the phosphor roots for future runs.
node.luminous_grotto.choice.4.text: (People-Reader) Sense the Freehands leader's worry and promise a future favor.
node.luminous_grotto.choice.5.text: Raise your cached supplies into a Freehands regatta and promise to keep it running.
node.luminous_grotto.choice.6.text: File the common tide charter so Aeol pilots match Freehands relief runs.
node.luminous_grotto.choice.7.text: Follow the glowing canal deeper into the underground network.
node.luminous_grotto.choice.8.text: Climb the phosphorescent roots to reach higher caverns.
node.ending_escape.text:
You slip a skiff into the phosphor canals before the patrol lights turn.
Cached crates from a dozen favors keep you ahead of every toll-chain.
By dusk, the mist remembers only the wake you chose to leave.
node.ending_escape.title: Hidden Canal Flight
node.ending_guestlaw.text:
You leave the chamber with the guest-law compact signed in four inks.
Dock masters swap updated ledgers, each hub agreeing to shelter travelers in turn.
No banner claims credit; the precedent simply hums through every root and rail.
node.ending_guestlaw.title: Guest-Law Compact
node.ending_correction.text:
You post yourself in the orrery's bronze heart, feeling each pulse through sap-stained gloves.
Season after season you tune the correction, synchronizing tides, caravans, and the breath of resting elders.
Travelers speak of the caretaker, not a name, when they note how the schedule never slips.
node.ending_correction.title: Orrery Caretaker
node.root_orrery_concourse.text: Vast living galleries spiral around a bronze-hearted trunk; saplight drips across calculating roots while caretakers whisper seasonal sums.
node.root_orrery_concourse.title: Orrery-of-Roots Concourse
node.root_orrery_concourse.choice.0.text: (Weaver) Descend along braided harness to the Loom Gallery.
node.root_orrery_concourse.choice.1.text: Take the freight ladder down to the Loom Gallery.
node.root_orrery_concourse.choice.2.text: (Archivist) Follow ledger etchings toward the Memory Vault.
node.root_orrery_concourse.choice.3.text: Consult the posted indices and head for the Memory Vault.
node.root_orrery_concourse.choice.4.text: (Healer) Trace the sap-scented draft into the infirmary roots.
node.root_orrery_concourse.choice.5.text: Trail the warm sap breeze toward the infirmary roots.
node.root_orrery_concourse.choice.6.text: (Arbiter) Present your docket to the registry tiers.
node.root_orrery_concourse.choice.7.text: Request a visitor chit for the registry tiers.
node.root_orrery_concourse.choice.8.text: (Weaver+Arbiter) Lace consensus cords to open the caretaker dais.
node.root_orrery_concourse.choice.9.text: (Healer+Resonant) Harmonize the pulse conduits before tending the infirmary.
node.root_orrery_concourse.choice.10.tex: (Archivist+Weaver) Pattern a schema that ushers you toward the lens cradle.
node.root_orrery_concourse.choice.11.tex: Step onto the caretaker dais at the orrery's heart.
node.root_orrery_concourse.choice.12.tex: Climb the service roots back to the Root Assembly Market.
node.root_orrery_concourse.choice.13.tex: Ride the tether back to the Startways Nexus.
node.root_orrery_registry.text: Brass-sheathed root clerks hum from loam-caked abaci, stamping living writs; one pulses through your palm, 'We feel urgency by soil-scent—steady yourself.'
node.root_orrery_registry.title: Root Registry Tiers
node.root_orrery_registry.choice.0.text: (Root-Writ) Bind a root-writ to unlock the threading chamber.
node.root_orrery_registry.choice.1.text: (Arbiter) Cite precedent to fast-track the correction.
node.root_orrery_registry.choice.2.text: Step back to gather missing components.
node.root_orrery_looms.text: Suspended walkways sway above root-driven gears as bronze filaments sing against living wood.
node.root_orrery_looms.title: Bronze Loom Gallery
node.root_orrery_looms.choice.0.text: (Weaver) Align the loom-cantilever to draw out a bronze filament.
node.root_orrery_looms.choice.1.text: Offer to cover a loom shift for a bronze filament spool.
node.root_orrery_looms.choice.2.text: Carry the bronze filament toward the correction gearroots.
node.root_orrery_looms.choice.3.text: Ride the lift back to the concourse.
node.root_orrery_archives.text: Shelves of resin tablets glow with captured seasons as quiet keepers tend to whispering root-scribes.
node.root_orrery_archives.title: Memory Vault Galleries
node.root_orrery_archives.choice.0.text: (Archivist) Sift seasonal ledgers for a root-writ template.
node.root_orrery_archives.choice.1.text: Donate courier notes to earn a copied root-writ.
node.root_orrery_archives.choice.2.text: Descend to the lens cradle where sap memories refract.
node.root_orrery_lens_cradle.text: A suspended basin of luminous sap refracts predictions while bronze arms hold half-formed lenses in gentle tension.
node.root_orrery_lens_cradle.title: Sap Lens Cradle
node.root_orrery_lens_cradle.choice.0.te: (Healer) Sing the sap flows clear, shaping a lens.
node.root_orrery_lens_cradle.choice.1.te: (Archivist) Calibrate the recorded seasons for a stable lens.
node.root_orrery_lens_cradle.choice.2.te: Promise to report your findings to borrow a sap lens.
node.root_orrery_lens_cradle.choice.3.te: Carry the sap lens to the alignment platform.
node.root_orrery_infirmary.text: Caretakers soothe stressed roots in warm pools while bronze splints hum with quiet corrective tones.
node.root_orrery_infirmary.title: Sap Infirmary Roots
node.root_orrery_infirmary.choice.0.text: (Healer) Massage the root knots, earning the caretakers' trust.
node.root_orrery_infirmary.choice.1.text: Apply bronze filament braces to stabilize fractures.
node.root_orrery_infirmary.choice.2.text: Commit to stay the season tending the correction.
node.root_orrery_dais.text: Bronze gimbals rise from the living trunk, their roots thrumming with equations waiting to be sung back into season.
node.root_orrery_dais.title: Caretaker Dais
node.root_orrery_dais.choice.0.text: (Weaver) Listen for the chord of seasons within the gears.
node.root_orrery_dais.choice.1.text: (Archivist) Inspect the correction logs for missing entries.
node.root_orrery_dais.choice.2.text: (Healer) Warm the sap channels feeding the dais.
node.root_orrery_dais.choice.3.text: (Arbiter) Evaluate the steward disputes over cadence.
node.root_orrery_dais.choice.5.text: Claim staging quarters for the Root Depths crews.
node.root_orrery_dais.choice.7.text: Trace the mirrored dunes route toward the Saltglass Expanse.
node.root_orrery_resonance.title: The Resonance Emergency
node.root_orrery_resonance.choice.0.text: 'Get me to the Startways Nexus immediately!'
node.root_orrery_resonance.choice.1.text: 'What kind of attacks? Can we fix the orrery first?'
node.root_orrery_resonance.choice.2.text: 'I need to understand the scope of this crisis.'
node.root_orrery_threading.text: Living gears clack patiently, awaiting the conductive braid that will restart their seasonal song.
node.root_orrery_threading.title: Gearroot Loom
node.root_orrery_threading.choice.0.text: Seat the bronze filament through the gearroots.
node.root_orrery_threading.choice.1.text: (Weaver) Hum the filament into sync with the roots.
node.root_orrery_threading.choice.2.text: Admit you need a bronze filament and retreat to the loom.
node.root_orrery_focus.text: Bronze arms arc overhead, ready to cradle a sap lens that can read the tree-machine's upcoming tides.
node.root_orrery_focus.title: Lens Alignment Platform
node.root_orrery_focus.choice.0.text: Set the sap lens into the focusing cradle.
node.root_orrery_focus.choice.1.text: (Healer) Coax clarity from the sap lens before placement.
node.root_orrery_focus.choice.2.text: Realize you still need the sap lens.
node.root_orrery_tuning.text: Root-crowns and bronze rings spin in cautious counterpoint, waiting for a guiding hand to set their season.
node.root_orrery_tuning.title: Tuning Gallery
node.root_orrery_tuning.choice.0.text: (Weaver) Weave the bronze and root pulses into a new cadence.
node.root_orrery_tuning.choice.1.text: (Archivist) Record the adjustments and signal the caretakers.
node.root_orrery_tuning.choice.2.text: (Healer) Channel restorative sap to smooth the change.
node.root_orrery_tuning.choice.3.text: (Arbiter) Affirm the correction in the Assembly ledgers.
node.root_orrery_tuning.choice.4.text: (Root-Speaker) Commune directly with the thinking tree.
node.root_orrery_tuning.choice.5.text: Hold the correction steady while the caretakers finish.
node.root_orrery_tuning.choice.6.text: Step away, leaving the correction incomplete.
node.root_orrery_mentor.text: A Root-Speaker rests within a hollowed node, listening to sap-currents and translating them into hushed counsel.
node.root_orrery_mentor.title: Root-Speaker Mentor
node.root_orrery_mentor.choice.0.text: (Root-Speaker) Echo the mentor's cadence into the sap chorus.
node.root_orrery_mentor.choice.1.text: Share a breath with the mentor and match their cadence.
node.root_orrery_mentor.choice.2.text: Discuss the correction schedule in greater detail.
node.startways_nexus.title: Startways Nexus - Central Command
node.startways_nexus.choice.0.text: [POLITICAL CRISIS] Investigate the missing Root Assembly delegates
node.startways_nexus.choice.1.text: [TRADE DISRUPTION] Address the escalating cartel price wars
node.startways_nexus.choice.3.text: [NETWORK COLLAPSE] Repair the failing transport grid
node.nexus_steward.text: A Quiet Ledger scribe polishes bronze seed-tokens, charting balances owed for each route. They offer whispered summaries of distant starts.
node.nexus_steward.title: Quiet Ledger Steward
node.nexus_steward.choice.0.text: (Tides) Ask about the Moon-Eel Suburb's tides.
node.nexus_steward.choice.1.text: (Gales) Ask about the storm-rail moorings above the canyons.
node.nexus_steward.choice.2.text: (Survey) Thank the steward and study the compass again.
node.nexus_steward.choice.3.text: (Freehands 1+) Approve relief manifests and hitch a lift to their cache.
node.nexus_steward.choice.4.text: Loop the Root Assembly dispatches into Quiet Ledger circulation for good.
node.nexus_steward.choice.5.text: (Keeper) Accept the ledgers and become the Keeper of Passways.
node.nexus_moon_eel_trial.text: Pearlescent ribs rise from a suspended tide-pool, the arch breathing with the pulse of a slumbering leviathan. Each swell reveals glimpses of aquatic tenements.
node.nexus_moon_eel_trial.title: Moon-Eel Archway
node.nexus_moon_eel_trial.choice.0.text: (Sneaky) Slip between the tidal pulses and trace the hidden current.
node.nexus_moon_eel_trial.choice.1.text: (Healer) Hum a tide-mending hymn to soothe the arch's restlessness.
node.nexus_moon_eel_trial.choice.2.text: (Calm) Match your breath to the tide and step through as it ebbs.
node.nexus_moon_eel_trial.choice.3.text: (Retreat) Let the arch settle and step back toward the compass.
node.nexus_moon_eel_reward.text: Cool brine spirals up your arms as ribcage homes ignite with lanterns. Canal-keepers beckon from within the leviathan's bones, promising sanctuary for the subtle and the gentle.
node.nexus_moon_eel_reward.title: Moon-Eel Suburb Echo
node.nexus_moon_eel_reward.choice.0.text: (Mark) Let the vision fade and note the route for later.
node.nexus_moon_eel_reward.choice.1.text: Accept canal hospitality and linger among the ribcage homes.
node.nexus_moon_eel_reward.choice.2.text: Carry their sanctuary tidings back through the luminous grotto.
node.nexus_moon_eel_reward.choice.3.text: (Root-Speaker) Listen through the rib-boughs for orchard callings.
node.nexus_moon_eel_reward.choice.4.text: (Dreamwalker) Drift with the eel's memory tide toward the cocoons.
node.nexus_storm_trial.text: A skeletal platform spins in captured gale-force winds. Rails flare with static as canyon drafts scream through stormglass vanes.
node.nexus_storm_trial.title: Storm-Rail Dais
node.nexus_storm_trial.choice.0.text: (Resonant) Sing a countercurrent to anchor the rail's frequency.
node.nexus_storm_trial.choice.1.text: (Cartographer) Plot the gust vectors and stride in their lee.
node.nexus_storm_trial.choice.2.text: (Steady) Brace against the railing and edge forward between surges.
node.nexus_storm_trial.choice.3.text: (Retreat) Descend before the winds wrench the dais apart.
node.nexus_storm_reward.text: You feel the thin air bite as mooring-spires arc above roaring canyons. Wind-rail sailors salute you, neon pennants snapping while storm engines glow.
node.nexus_storm_reward.title: Storm Rail Vista
node.nexus_storm_reward.choice.0.text: (Chart) Record the path and let the winds calm.
node.nexus_storm_reward.choice.1.text: Ride the wind-rail onward to the storm rail moorings.
node.nexus_storm_reward.choice.2.text: Signal an escort glide back toward the Sky-Spliced Docks.
node.nexus_storm_reward.choice.3.text: Send the mapped gusts toward Saltglass outriders preparing a convoy.
node.nexus_storm_reward.choice.4.text: (Storm-Conductor) Tune the captured gale toward the Cloud-Burrow stormloom.
node.moon_eel_intro.text: Aquatic tenements cling inside a moon-eel's ribcage, their windows pulsing with low tide glow. Residents ferry messages along bubble elevators and whisper of Startways favors.
node.moon_eel_intro.title: Moon-Eel Suburb
node.moon_eel_intro.choice.0.text: Slip along canal spines toward the Startways Nexus.
node.moon_eel_intro.choice.1.text: Navigate the flood channels toward the luminous grotto.
node.moon_eel_intro.choice.2.text: Glide along bubble elevators toward the cocoon hostel.
node.moon_eel_intro.choice.3.text: (Tide-Singer) Harmonize the tide glow to open a quiet retreat toward the Amber Tides cloister.
node.moon_eel_intro.choice.4.text: Stay on to curate the ribcage guesthouse and mind the tide diaries.
node.storm_rail_intro.text: Wind-rail moorings straddle a canyon mouth, each rail humming with charged gusts. Aeol riggers trade gust scripts while Freehands couriers lash down cargo.
node.storm_rail_intro.title: Storm Rail Mooring
node.storm_rail_intro.choice.0.text: Ride the wind-rail down to the Sky-Spliced Docks.
node.storm_rail_intro.choice.1.text: Follow the compass line back to the Startways Nexus.
node.storm_rail_intro.choice.2.text: Chart a supply glide toward the Saltglass Expanse.
node.storm_rail_intro.choice.3.text: (Storm-Conductor) Lash the charged winds into a drop toward the Cloud-Burrow threshold.
node.saltglass_expanse.text: Mirrored dunes ripple around migrating glass-reefs while walking shade engines stride overhead, casting cool rivers of shadow.
node.saltglass_expanse.title: Saltglass Expanse
node.saltglass_expanse.choice.0.text: (Cartographer) Align the mirrored dune ridges with the reef migration.
node.saltglass_expanse.choice.1.text: Enter the walking shade engine's bazaar decks.
node.saltglass_expanse.choice.2.text: (Sneaky) Ghost along the engine struts toward the southern obelisk.
node.saltglass_expanse.choice.3.text: (Scout) Scale a mirror dune to flag a clear caravan lane.
node.saltglass_expanse.choice.4.text: (Lumenar) Refract the dunes' glare to reveal the buried orrery route.
node.saltglass_expanse.choice.5.text: (Tinkerer) Tune the envoy dais so caravan speakers can gather.
node.saltglass_expanse.choice.6.text: (Lumenar) Signal Aeol outriders for a direct Startways flight.
node.saltglass_expanse.choice.7.text: Spend a favor to hitch a basket-lift into the Cloud-Burrow Warrens.
node.saltglass_expanse.choice.8.text: (Resonant) Harmonize dune song with Aeol lifts and glide into the Cloud-Burrow.
node.saltglass_expanse.choice.9.text: Trade a map sliver to plot a Startways drop point.
node.saltglass_expanse.choice.10.text: (Quiet Ledger 1+) Call in ledger pilots to escort you to the caravan council.
node.saltglass_expanse.choice.11.text: (Freehands 1+) Rally outriders to ferry mutual aid between stranded caravans.
node.saltglass_expanse.choice.12.text: Trail the memory-laden caravan toward the Starfallen Orchard.
node.saltglass_expanse.choice.13.text: Follow the tuned root-paths back to the Caretaker Dais.
node.saltglass_expanse.choice.14.text: Lock in your mapped corridors and guide the caravans through a shared shade rota.
node.saltglass_shade_bazaar.text: Canvas streets coil inside a walking shade engine; caravans barter under glass awnings while pistons thrum with migrating rhythm.
node.saltglass_shade_bazaar.title: Shade Engine Bazaar
node.saltglass_shade_bazaar.choice.0.tex: (Tinkerer) Recalibrate the cooling vanes to earn a shade key.
node.saltglass_shade_bazaar.choice.1.tex: Haul spare struts to the repair cradle.
node.saltglass_shade_bazaar.choice.2.tex: (Cartographer) Trade dune coordinates for a map sliver.
node.saltglass_shade_bazaar.choice.3.tex: (Sneaky) Shadow a Freehands runner toward the reef scouts.
node.saltglass_shade_bazaar.choice.4.tex: (Sneaky+Lumenar) Diffuse the echo-market's glare to chart contraband routes.
node.saltglass_shade_bazaar.choice.5.tex: (Cartographer+Glasswright) Fuse mirrored charts into a private prism vault.
node.saltglass_shade_bazaar.choice.6.tex: (Lumenar+Tinkerer) Retrofit a glider harness to surf the shade thermals.
node.saltglass_shade_bazaar.choice.7.tex: Step back out into the mirrored dunes.
node.saltglass_shade_workshop.text: Glass-lathes hum beside cooling cisterns as artisans tune shade vanes for the migrating caravans.
node.saltglass_shade_workshop.title: Shade Engine Workshop
node.saltglass_shade_workshop.choice.0.t: (Tinkerer) Assemble a color baffle from refractor scraps.
node.saltglass_shade_workshop.choice.1.t: (Sneaky) Pocket a map sliver from the shipping manifest.
node.saltglass_shade_workshop.choice.2.t: (Lumenar) Fuse the glass seams to steady the walking city.
node.saltglass_shade_workshop.choice.3.t: Ask the Glasswright mentor to review your latticework.
node.saltglass_shade_workshop.choice.4.t: Return to the bazaar's central deck.
node.saltglass_echo_lattice.text: Contraband choruses shimmer along suspended wires, each songline masking a trade route beneath resonant camouflage.
node.saltglass_echo_lattice.title: Echo-Market Lattice
node.saltglass_echo_lattice.choice.0.tex: Sync the song routes with Freehands relief paths.
node.saltglass_echo_lattice.choice.1.tex: Archive the encoded melodies for Quiet Ledger auditors.
node.saltglass_echo_lattice.choice.2.tex: Fade back toward the bazaar decks before the chorus shifts.
node.saltglass_prism_cache.text: Interlocking panes fold around a recessed vault, projecting overlays of root corrections and shade migrations as you work.
node.saltglass_prism_cache.title: Mirrored Prism Cache
node.saltglass_prism_cache.choice.0.text: Etch the composite charts into a portable prism for the Root Assembly.
node.saltglass_prism_cache.choice.1.text: Seal the vault and return the mirrored panels to the bazaar.
node.saltglass_prism_cache.choice.2.text: Carry the mirrored insights toward the sharecrop commons.
node.saltglass_prism_cache.choice.3.text: (Root-Speaker) Thread the prism pulses into orchard sap channels.
node.saltglass_glider_bay.text: Shade engine riggers suspend glider harnesses above roaring vents, timing launch windows with caravans on the move.
node.saltglass_glider_bay.title: Thermal Glider Bay
node.saltglass_glider_bay.choice.0.text: Launch along the thermal to scout the cloud-burrow approaches.
node.saltglass_glider_bay.choice.1.text: Glide down to the mirrored dunes near the Freehands cache.
node.saltglass_glider_bay.choice.2.text: Fold the harness away and return to the bazaar.
node.saltglass_ledger_convoy.text: Amber-lit skiffs bearing Quiet Ledger sigils anchor beside the caravan council, their coffers ready to stabilize trade routes.
node.saltglass_ledger_convoy.title: Ledger-Piloted Convoy
node.saltglass_ledger_convoy.choice.0.te: Allocate the convoy's funding to reinforce guest-law patrols.
node.saltglass_ledger_convoy.choice.1.te: Divert a tithe toward Freehands relief runners.
node.saltglass_ledger_convoy.choice.2.te: Thank the pilots and return to the mirrored dunes.
node.saltglass_freehands_cache.text: Mutual-aid lockers carved into the dunes brim with ration cords, water bladders, and shade salves awaiting redistribution.
node.saltglass_freehands_cache.title: Freehands Relief Cache
Distribute supplies along the caravans' shadowed path.
Log the cache usage for Quiet Ledger reimbursements.
Return to the bazaar with remaining supplies.
Post yourself at the cache ledger and coordinate every relief dispatch.
Follow the convoy route back to the main expanse.
node.saltglass_glass_reef.text: Fractal ridges of living glass surge like a slow tide, caravan tents lashed to their mirrored spines beneath roaming shade engines.
node.saltglass_glass_reef.title: Migratory Glass Reef
node.saltglass_glass_reef.choice.0.text: (Cartographer) Plot the reef's migration by mirrored stars.
node.saltglass_glass_reef.choice.1.text: (Lumenar) Pulse calming light to let caravans slip past.
node.saltglass_glass_reef.choice.2.text: (Sneaky) Slip along the reef's underside toward the southern obelisk.
node.saltglass_glass_reef.choice.3.text: Ride a tethered skiff back toward the shade engine.
node.saltglass_dune_archive.text: Strata of polished sand scroll with glint-script, each dune facet storing routes for the wandering cities.
node.saltglass_dune_archive.title: Mirrored Dune Archive
node.saltglass_dune_archive.choice.0.tex: (Cartographer) Translate the mirrored scripts into a map sliver.
node.saltglass_dune_archive.choice.1.tex: (Lumenar) Diffuse the glare into a portable color baffle.
node.saltglass_dune_archive.choice.2.tex: Spend a map sliver to unlock the refractor walkway beneath the dunes.
node.saltglass_dune_archive.choice.3.tex: Retreat before the dunes shift again.
node.saltglass_carravan_council.text: Delegates debate beneath walking engine ribs while mirrored charts flutter between tents of traveling glasswrights.
node.saltglass_carravan_council.title: Caravan Council of Moving Shade
node.saltglass_carravan_council.choice.0: (Cartographer) Present layered map slivers to redirect the caravans.
node.saltglass_carravan_council.choice.1: (Sneaky) Whisper to outriders to secure covert passage rights.
node.saltglass_carravan_council.choice.2: (Scout) Deliver field charts to widen the Freehands relief lane.
node.saltglass_carravan_council.choice.3: (Lumenar) Drape the council with cooled shade to settle tempers.
node.saltglass_carravan_council.choice.4: Set the treaty dais with your shade key.
node.saltglass_carravan_council.choice.5: Carry your notes back to the shade bazaar.
node.saltglass_obelisk_north.text: A mirrored spire pierces the dunes, refracting the shade engine's shadow into sweeping compass arcs.
node.saltglass_obelisk_north.title: Northern Glint Obelisk
node.saltglass_obelisk_north.choice.0.te: (Cartographer) Chart the northern glint obelisk's reflection lilt.
node.saltglass_obelisk_north.choice.1.te: (Tinkerer) Reseat the obelisk's hinge to redirect shade.
node.saltglass_obelisk_north.choice.2.te: Deploy a color baffle to signal the reef outriders.
node.saltglass_obelisk_north.choice.3.te: Slide down the mirrored ridge back toward the dunes.
node.saltglass_obelisk_south.text: Glass-reef barnacles cling to the southern obelisk, its beam sweeping migrating camps with restless color.
node.saltglass_obelisk_south.title: Southern Glint Obelisk
node.saltglass_obelisk_south.choice.0.te: (Cartographer) Map the southern obelisk's moving shadows.
node.saltglass_obelisk_south.choice.1.te: (Sneaky) Ride the reef's underside to stash a map sliver.
node.saltglass_obelisk_south.choice.2.te: (Tinkerer) Stitch a color baffle lattice around the beam.
node.saltglass_obelisk_south.choice.3.te: Follow the mirrored track back to the camp.
node.saltglass_obelisk_east.text: The eastern obelisk pivots above a sea of mirrored dunes, its beam catching distant shade engines in prismatic arcs.
node.saltglass_obelisk_east.title: Eastern Glint Obelisk
node.saltglass_obelisk_east.choice.0.tex: (Cartographer) Align the eastern glint with your star chart.
node.saltglass_obelisk_east.choice.1.tex: (Lumenar) Bend the beam to reveal hidden camp caches.
node.saltglass_obelisk_east.choice.2.tex: Take the mirrored steps back toward the dune archive.
node.saltglass_obelisk_east.choice.3.tex: Thread the glint lines toward the northern obelisk.
node.saltglass_glint_merge_ne.text: Northern and eastern beams overlap in a lattice of ghost-light, humming with routes waiting to be tied off.
node.saltglass_glint_merge_ne.title: Glint Alignment Confluence
node.saltglass_glint_merge_ne.choice.0.t: (Cartographer) Weave in the northern glint pathways.
node.saltglass_glint_merge_ne.choice.1.t: Let the reflections fall out of sync and retreat.
node.saltglass_glint_merge_ne.choice.2.t: Steer the reflections into a safe corridor toward the Moon-Eel Suburb.
node.saltglass_glint_merge_ne.choice.3.t: (Storm-Conductor) Braid the gust-lights toward the Cloud-Burrow stormloom.
node.saltglass_glint_merge_ring.text: Three glint obelisks cast intersecting halos, a mirrored ring spinning fast enough to etch a permanent route.
node.saltglass_glint_merge_ring.title: Triangulation Ring
node.saltglass_glint_merge_ring.choice.0: (Cartographer) Seal the triangulation with the southern obelisk.
node.saltglass_glint_merge_ring.choice.1: Carry the completed map to the caravan council.
node.saltglass_glint_merge_ring.choice.2: Let the reflections dim and return to the dunes.
node.saltglass_treaty_alignment.text: Prism panels unfurl as your shade key slots into place, the walking city's shadow forming a parliament of light.
node.saltglass_treaty_alignment.title: Treaty Dais of Moving Shade
node.saltglass_treaty_alignment.choice.0: (Cartographer) Proclaim the Treaty of Moving Shade.
node.saltglass_treaty_alignment.choice.1: (Tinkerer) Adjust the shade engine clamps for leverage.
node.saltglass_treaty_alignment.choice.2: Step back to the caravan council with your findings.
node.mentor_glasswright_intro.text: A master glasswright rides a kiln-backed crawler, sketching shade lattices in hovering light.
node.mentor_glasswright_intro.title: Glasswright Kilnback
node.mentor_glasswright_intro.choice.0.t: (Tinkerer) Present your lattice sketches for critique.
node.mentor_glasswright_intro.choice.1.t: (Cartographer) Show how you mapped the engine's ribs to guide the reefs.
node.mentor_glasswright_intro.choice.2.t: Ask for guidance on balancing migrating shade.
node.mentor_glasswright_trial.text: The mentor raises a lattice of heat and glass, expecting you to anchor the migrating shadows.
node.mentor_glasswright_trial.title: Glasswright Trial Loom
node.mentor_glasswright_trial.choice.0.t: (Lumenar) Bend kiln-light to follow the mentor's pattern.
node.mentor_glasswright_trial.choice.1.t: (Tinkerer) Stitch a color baffle into the shade engine seam.
node.mentor_glasswright_trial.choice.2.t: (Sneaky) Slip a map sliver under the lens to reveal hidden fractures.
node.mentor_glasswright_trial.choice.3.t: Admit you need more practice and return to the workshop.
node.mentor_glasswright_award.text: Satisfied, the mentor traces a sigil of refracted light and offers a shard inscribed with your new calling.
node.mentor_glasswright_award.title: Glasswright Accord
node.mentor_glasswright_award.choice.0.t: Accept the lattice oath and become a Glasswright.
node.mentor_glasswright_award.choice.1.t: (Tinkerer) Swear to tend the migratory shade engines.
node.mentor_glasswright_award.choice.2.t: (Sneaky) Promise to guard the hidden fractures of the reefs.
node.mentor_glasswright_award.choice.3.t: Thank the mentor and step back into the workshop.
node.cloud_burrow_threshold.text: Honeycombed isles hang upside-down overhead, their streets braided around burrow balconies while wind-moles scurry along inverted rails.
node.cloud_burrow_threshold.title: Cloud-Burrow Threshold
node.cloud_burrow_threshold.choice.0.tex: (Scout) Traverse the underside walkway to chart the plaza levels.
node.cloud_burrow_threshold.choice.1.tex: Accept a tethered basket up toward the burrow balconies.
node.cloud_burrow_threshold.choice.2.tex: (Resonant) Hum along the updraft and let it lift you toward the resonance wells.
node.cloud_burrow_threshold.choice.3.tex: Ride the dunes' return current back to the Saltglass Expanse.
node.cloud_burrow_threshold.choice.4.tex: (Aeol 1+) Ride a rostered courier draft back toward the Startways Nexus.
node.cloud_burrow_threshold.choice.5.tex: Post the balcony safety concord for Aeol couriers and burrow crews.
node.cloud_burrow_threshold.choice.6.tex: Stay on the balconies to coordinate the cooperative glideway.
node.cloud_burrow_inverted_plaza.text: Vendors hang beneath the plaza's stone belly, trading wind-tethered wares while passerby stride along upside-down streets.
node.cloud_burrow_inverted_plaza.title: Inverted Plaza
(Scout) Follow the spine-walks to trace tunnel junctions.
(Emissary) Present guest-law seals to the aerie elders for a windbone token.
Barter for gust sweets and gossip about burrow routes.
(Scout+Resonant) Pace the underside cadence to open an echo span.
(Weaver+Storm-Conductor) Braid gust cords with plaza banners to stabilize a stormloom.
(Sneaky+Cartographer) Trace the inverted relief lines to a hidden map cache.
Climb the spiral gantry toward the storm gallery.
node.cloud_burrow_balcony_warrens.text: Wind-mole families lounge in hammocks slung beneath the stone, their dens opening onto dangling porches fragrant with sun-baked roots.
node.cloud_burrow_balcony_warrens.title: Burrow Balconies
node.cloud_burrow_balcony_warrens.choice: (Healer) Tend the kits' wind-burned paws and earn the family's trust.
(Resonant) Match the burrow songs until the elders gift you a whistle.
Offer a favor chit to join the burrow's guest ledger.
Follow the wind-hand interpreters toward the signway balcony.
Thank the family and descend toward the threshold.
node.cloud_burrow_guest_ledger.text: The mole matriarch inks your name beside the guest whistles and gestures toward hammocks reserved for trusted allies.
node.cloud_burrow_guest_ledger.title: Guest Ledger Alcove
Follow the steward up toward the loft hammocks.
Thank the family and descend toward the threshold.
Transfer the ledger notes into the hidden skip cache.
Use the guest passages to return to the central nexus.
node.cloud_burrow_resonant_wells.text: Stone flutes wind through the cavern, channeling updrafts into a trembling chord that keeps the warrens aloft.
node.cloud_burrow_resonant_wells.title: Resonant Wells
(Resonant) Shape the chord until the updraft recognizes your cadence.
(Resonant) Sign the wind-hand cant with the well tenders and plan a silent relay.
(Healer) Ease the wind-tenders' ringing ears with cooling salves.
Study the carved notations to better read the burrow flows.
node.cloud_burrow_windbone_forum.text: Aeol arbiters and mole elders trade windbone tokens beneath fluttering pennants, each gust notarized with chime-scribed sigils.
node.cloud_burrow_windbone_forum.title: Windbone Forum
(Emissary) Mediate gust-rights to receive a windbone token.
(Scout) Slip along the underside ledger paths to map the tunnels.
(Resonant) Join the chime-call to steady the gust tallies.
(Arbiter) Convene a signed gust moot so every burrow shares the breeze fairly.
Carry gust petitions back to the embassy clerks.
node.cloud_burrow_chime_market.text: Strings of wind-chimes ring in shifting gravity, vendors trading gust teas and burrow quilts along the plaza's underside.
node.cloud_burrow_chime_market.title: Chime-Lit Market
Sample gust teas with Freehands vendors and trade stories.
(Resonant) Sign along with the market chorus to steady the inverted stalls.
(Emissary) Broker a truce between Aeol traders and burrow runners.
Use your burrow map to slip into the service tunnels.
node.cloud_burrow_signway_balcony.text: Harness lines cradle a quiet overlook where wind-mole interpreters trade gust-hand signs while lanterns dim to carry silent messages.
node.cloud_burrow_signway_balcony.title: Signway Balcony
node.cloud_burrow_signway_balcony.choice: (Resonant) Flash the wind-hand greetings and sync your pulse to their silent count.
Borrow a gust-slate to sketch your reply for the interpreters.
Climb back toward the burrow balconies.
node.cloud_burrow_signway_forum.text: Community representatives circle a suspended ledger, palms flickering in gust-hand phrases to balance passage lanes.
node.cloud_burrow_signway_forum.title: Signed Gust Moot
node.cloud_burrow_signway_forum.choice.0: (Resonant) Lead a silent compromise so every burrow receives the breeze it needs.
node.cloud_burrow_signway_forum.choice.1: Take notes on a ribbon-slate and pass them between the negotiators.
node.cloud_burrow_signway_forum.choice.2: Return the petitions to the windbone forum.
node.cloud_burrow_signway_well.text: Luminous cords sway beside the updraft well, each gesture translating into soft pulses that calm the gale.
node.cloud_burrow_signway_well.title: Silent Updraft Brace
(Resonant) Sign the gale-lattice into harmony and teach the watchers the pattern.
Hang lantern cues so anyone can follow the new silent counts.
Glide back toward the resonance wells.
node.cloud_burrow_echo_span.text: An inverted bridge of resonant wire hums between plaza spires, each step tuning the gale toward distant wells.
node.cloud_burrow_echo_span.title: Echo Span
node.cloud_burrow_echo_span.choice.0.tex: Guide the span's hum toward the resonance wells for future travelers.
node.cloud_burrow_echo_span.choice.1.tex: Mark the span for Freehands runners to ferry supplies.
node.cloud_burrow_echo_span.choice.2.tex: Retrace your steps back to the inverted plaza.
node.cloud_burrow_stormloom.text: Banners woven with gust cords billow around a suspended loom, braiding stormlines into stable conduits.
node.cloud_burrow_stormloom.title: Stormloom Gantry
node.cloud_burrow_stormloom.choice.0.tex: Lock the stormloom into the gallery's training schedule.
node.cloud_burrow_stormloom.choice.1.tex: Let the stormloom unwind and return to the plaza.
node.cloud_burrow_stormloom.choice.2.tex: Escort the braided cords up toward the guest ledger alcove.
node.cloud_burrow_stormloom.choice.3.tex: (Storm-Conductor) Conduct the charged threads toward the Saltglass convoy staging.
node.cloud_burrow_hidden_cache.text: Behind a tessellated hatch, suspended maps pulse with skip-trajectory ink tracing seams between gust lanes.
node.cloud_burrow_hidden_cache.title: Hidden Rift Cache
Decode the skip-trajectory and seek the mentor who drafted it.
Leave the cache sealed and return to the plaza.
Copy the skip-lines into the guest ledger for future allies.
node.mentor_rift_skipper_intro.text: A rift-skipper lounges between suspended anchors, eyes tracking unseen seams as they test a ring of phase-tuning stones.
node.mentor_rift_skipper_intro.title: Rift-Skipper's Perch
Present the decoded map and request training.
Study the anchors from afar and slip back to the plaza.
Discuss the skip map's context back at the hidden cache.
(Dreamwalker) Match the anchor rhythm to shared dream currents.
node.mentor_rift_skipper_trial.text: The mentor releases phase stones into the gale, expecting you to thread leaps between inverted streets before they collide.
node.mentor_rift_skipper_trial.title: Rift-Skipper Trial
(Sneaky) Slide along shadow seams to land on each anchor silently.
(Cartographer) Plot the skip vectors to anticipate each anchor drift.
(Storm-Conductor) Harness the gale's beat to propel each leap.
Yield before the phase stones destabilize.
node.mentor_rift_skipper_award.text: The mentor presses a phase stone into your palm, granting you the call-sign of those who slip between seams.
node.mentor_rift_skipper_award.title: Rift-Skipper Accord
(Shadow Line) Accept the phase stone and swear the Rift-Skipper oath.
(Charted Line) Accept the phase stone and imprint your plotted skips.
(Storm-Conductor) Bind the gale to your new route and accept the title.
Thank the mentor and plan your next skip.
node.cloud_burrow_tunnel_survey.text: Luminous lichen paints the burrow walls while pressure-gauges tick, the air thick with drifting soil motes.
node.cloud_burrow_tunnel_survey.title: Tunnel Survey
node.cloud_burrow_tunnel_survey.choice.0: (Scout) Chart the branching shafts into a proper burrow map.
node.cloud_burrow_tunnel_survey.choice.1: Blow your mole-whistle to call guides deeper.
node.cloud_burrow_tunnel_survey.choice.2: Plant wind-markers pointing back to the threshold.
node.cloud_burrow_mole_warren.text: Warm tunnels spiral around a humming airshaft where elders braid wind-fronds into cushioning nests.
node.cloud_burrow_mole_warren.title: Wind-Mole Warren
node.cloud_burrow_mole_warren.choice.0.t: (Healer) Soothe the elder burrowers with herbal poultices.
node.cloud_burrow_mole_warren.choice.1.t: (Emissary) Negotiate shared gust-runs between rival warrens.
node.cloud_burrow_mole_warren.choice.2.t: Blow the mole-whistle to open a path toward the updraft well.
node.cloud_burrow_mole_warren.choice.3.t: Share Saltglass news and accept woven wind-charms.
node.cloud_burrow_quiet_scrip.text: Ledger envoys suspend balance-beads across gust models, allocating stipends to stabilize the burrow lanes.
node.cloud_burrow_quiet_scrip.title: Quiet Ledger Scrip Room
node.cloud_burrow_quiet_scrip.choice.0.t: Channel funding toward the storm gallery's upkeep.
node.cloud_burrow_quiet_scrip.choice.1.t: Divert an emergency stipend to the Freehands chain.
node.cloud_burrow_quiet_scrip.choice.2.t: Close the ledgers and return to the embassy.
node.cloud_burrow_freehands_drop.text: Mutual-aid parcels swing between balconies on woven cords, volunteers timing releases with each gust.
node.cloud_burrow_freehands_drop.title: Freehands Balcony Drop
Coordinate the drop schedule so every den receives relief.
Document the operation for Quiet Ledger reimbursement.
Ride a supply cord back toward the inverted plaza.
Return to the main cloud burrow threshold.
node.cloud_burrow_loft.text: Ozone tang frays the fluff-swaddled hammocks; a wind-mole steward sniffs, 'Updraft tastes wary,' while glider bones sing along the gale-tuned chimes.
node.cloud_burrow_loft.title: Cloud-Burrow Loft
node.cloud_burrow_loft.choice.0.text: Glide down to the inverted plaza.
node.cloud_burrow_loft.choice.1.text: (Scout) Sketch hidden shortcuts between balcony warrens.
node.cloud_burrow_loft.choice.2.text: (Resonant) Sign-chime harmonies with the wind-mole chorus.
node.cloud_burrow_loft.choice.3.text: Share tea and plan your next foray back toward the Saltglass Expanse.
node.cloud_burrow_embassy.text: A suspended chamber balances Aeol scrolls and burrow knot-ledgers, envoys drifting between inverted desks.
node.cloud_burrow_embassy.title: Sky Burrow Embassy
node.cloud_burrow_embassy.choice.0.text: (Emissary) Deliver Aeol letters securing new gust accords.
node.cloud_burrow_embassy.choice.1.text: (Healer) Ease the negotiators' pressure aches with balancing tonics.
node.cloud_burrow_embassy.choice.2.text: (Quiet Ledger 1+) Underwrite new gust corridors for the burrow budget.
node.cloud_burrow_embassy.choice.3.text: (Freehands 1+) Coordinate balcony mutual aid drops for wind-mole crews.
node.cloud_burrow_embassy.choice.4.text: Request a tether back toward the Saltglass Expanse.
node.cloud_burrow_embassy.choice.5.text: Review the ledgers to mark new burrow passages.
node.cloud_burrow_embassy.choice.6.text: Spend your windbone token to board an Aeol lift toward the Startways Nexus.
node.cloud_burrow_embassy.choice.7.text: Claim the night shift at the waystation and guide caravans in.
node.cloud_burrow_storm_gallery.text: A ring of inverted chimes focuses the gale, apprentices pacing the rim as they coax gusts through carved vents.
node.cloud_burrow_storm_gallery.title: Storm Gallery
node.cloud_burrow_storm_gallery.choice.0: (Resonant) Ring the chimes in time with the gale and request mentorship.
node.cloud_burrow_storm_gallery.choice.1: (Scout) Trace safe airways leading toward the updraft well.
node.cloud_burrow_storm_gallery.choice.2: Observe the apprentices adjusting each gust vane.
node.cloud_burrow_storm_gallery.choice.3: Accept a tide-clergy invitation down to the Amber Tides Necropolis.
node.cloud_burrow_updraft_well.text: A roaring column of wind spirals through the heart of the warrens, stray chimes spinning like constellations in the gale.
node.cloud_burrow_updraft_well.title: Updraft Well
(Resonant) Bind the gale into an unshattered song.
Blow your mole-whistle to guide the gust toward the warrens.
Trace your burrow map for a safer descent.
Step back before the gale peaks.
node.mentor_storm_conductor_intro.text: The Storm-Conductor stands amid suspended batons, each stroke tuning a different gust coursing through the gallery.
node.mentor_storm_conductor_intro.title: Storm-Conductor Atrium
node.mentor_storm_conductor_intro.choice: (Resonant) Echo the mentor's baton patterns in song.
(Scout) Present mapped air-currents from the warrens.
Ask for guidance in balancing the gust ledger.
node.mentor_storm_conductor_trial.text: Batons whirl as the mentor releases a tangle of gusts, expecting you to weave current, chorus, and care into one flow.
node.mentor_storm_conductor_trial.title: Tempest Loom Trial
node.mentor_storm_conductor_trial.choice: (Resonant) Sing counterwinds that stitch the gale together.
(Emissary) Coordinate the watch-lines so every gust yields passage.
(Healer) Steady the apprentices as the gale surges.
Bow out before the tempest overwhelms you.
node.mentor_storm_conductor_award.text: With the gale subdued, the mentor threads a windbone baton into your hands and marks you as kin to the storm.
node.mentor_storm_conductor_award.title: Storm-Conductor Accord
node.mentor_storm_conductor_award.choice: (Resonant) Accept the baton and swear to keep the gale whole.
(Emissary) Pledge to coordinate every gust-bound envoy.
(Healer) Vow to tend the conductors who keep the gale balanced.
Thank the mentor and return to the gallery.
