Carry the dream ribbon toward the orchard's dream nursery.
node.orchard_keeper_hut.text: Meteor-fruit hang from rafters like lanterns, each pulsing with whispers of seasons past. Ledger-boards and grafting tools crowd the hut, inviting you to steward the memories stored here.
node.orchard_keeper_hut.title: Orchard Keeper's Hut
node.orchard_keeper_hut.choice.0.text: (Resonant) Hum with the rafters until the stored fruit echo your pitch.
node.orchard_keeper_hut.choice.1.text: (Cartographer) Study the pinned root-maps to plot the ripest rows.
node.orchard_keeper_hut.choice.2.text: Step outside into the meteoric grove.
node.orchard_keeper_hut.choice.3.text: Offer to log today's gleanings for the sharecrop commons.
node.starfallen_orchard_meteoric_gate.te: Meteor-split trunks arch overhead, humming as orchardists check ledgers hung from branches. Dew that remembers every footfall beads along the path ahead.
node.starfallen_orchard_meteoric_gate.ch: (Resonant) Trade chords with the gatekeeper to align the grove's pulse.
(Cartographer) Trace the meteor scars to orient the next harvest rows.
(Cartographer+Glasswright) Align mirrored root maps to open a harmonic passage.
Shadow the orchardists toward the echo press hall.
Peel away along the saltglass trade path.
node.starfallen_orchard_echo_press.text: Copper presses squeeze starlit juice into memory flasks while archivists whisper transcripts. The air tastes of resin and rain recalled from distant harvests.
node.starfallen_orchard_echo_press.title: Echo Press Hall
node.starfallen_orchard_echo_press.choic: Help catalogue the jars of remembered rain.
(Glasswright) Recalibrate the prismatic decanters to catch stray memories.
(Glasswright+Root-Speaker) Fuse saplight and latticework to balance the press.
(Dreamwalker+Healer) Dream a restorative blend for weary orchardists.
(Healer) Massage sap-weary hands with meteor balm.
(Favor) Trade a favor for a private memory graft.
node.starfallen_orchard_memory_rows.text: Rows of luminous fruit sway with chimes of stored voices, each branch etched with meteor glass tallies. Orchardists nod as you pass, their satchels heavy with stories owed.
node.starfallen_orchard_memory_rows.choi: Follow the furrow toward the meteor cradle.
(Cartographer) Note the resonance lines and update your root map.
(Resonant) Lead a lullaby to settle the most burdened branches.
(Tide-Singer+Cartographer) Chart tidal graft rotations for the sharecrop canals.
Gather shared fruit for the coming commons.
node.starfallen_orchard_harmonic_map.tex: Resonance threads weave across etched root maps, projecting overlapping songlines of the orchard's harvest routes.
node.starfallen_orchard_harmonic_map.cho: Anchor the harmonic overlay to guide future gleaners.
Carry the humming map toward the sharecrop commons.
Deliver the harmonic chart to the tidal channel loom.
(Root-Speaker) Anchor the songlines into the meteor cradle's roots.
node.starfallen_orchard_prism_roots.text: Sap conduits spiral through glass prisms, refracting memory light into roots awaiting careful tending.
node.starfallen_orchard_prism_roots.choi: Stabilize the prisms and record the procedure for the archives.
Channel the balanced sap toward ailing branches in the grove.
Dispatch a glass courier toward the Cloud-Burrow guest ledger.
(Tide-Singer) Pulse the sap with tidelines toward the Amber Tides cloister.
node.starfallen_orchard_dream_nursery.te: Cocoons hang between meteor boughs while healers braid lullabies through shared dreams of future harvests.
node.starfallen_orchard_dream_nursery.ch: Guide the restful dream toward the sharecrop volunteers.
Record the tonic formula for Quiet Ledger healers.
Guide the rested gleaners back toward the meteor gate.
(Dreamwalker) Thread the lullaby toward the Moon-Eel sanctuary.
node.starfallen_orchard_tidal_channel.te: Irrigation channels shimmer with tide-memory, ready to be tuned so sharecrop fruit ripens with distant tides.
node.starfallen_orchard_tidal_channel.ch: Synchronize the tidal schedule with the sharecrop commons.
Carry the tidal insights to the Freehands collective.
Carry tide readings to the Quiet Ledger grant hall.
(Tide-Singer) Bind a currentway toward the Amber Tides cloister.
Follow the meteor trail to the exit gateway.
node.starfallen_orchard_quiet_grant.text: Ledger stewards tally fruit stores and allocate amber credits to sustain the commons' shared harvest.
node.starfallen_orchard_quiet_grant.choi: Apply the grant to expand the sharecrop tables.
Share a portion with the Freehands gleaner network.
Return to the meteor gate with updated tallies.
Follow the meteor trail back toward the main expanse.
Follow the meteor trail to the exit gateway.
node.starfallen_orchard_freehands_collec: Volunteers parcel fruit bundles and graft slips for neighboring crews, sharing stories beneath meteor-lit canopies.
Distribute the bundles across the commons.
Log the gleaners' routes for Quiet Ledger auditors.
Carry surplus fruit toward the tidal channel.
Follow the meteor trail to the exit gateway.
node.starfallen_orchard_meteor_cradle.te: At the crater's heart, meteoric stone cradles saplings whose skins shimmer with falling starlight. Warmth rolls from the pit, smelling of ozone and fresh parchment.
node.starfallen_orchard_meteor_cradle.ch: (Glasswright) Shape fused rind into lattice keys for the archive.
(Healer) Draw the meteor warmth to ease orchardists' joints.
Collect fallen starfruit to feed the commons kettle.
Circle back toward the meteoric gate.
Suspended chimes and taut vines resonate with distant thunder, carrying the grove's memory-song. Orchardists rest beneath the hum, cupping fruit to catch each echo.
(Resonant) Thread your chord through the grove's chorus.
(Healer) Sync breath with the tenders to steady their pulse.
Carry the bottled chord toward the sharecrop fire.
Slip back through the listening rows.
node.starfallen_orchard_cartography_cano: A lattice of ladders and meteor glass platforms reveals the grove's constellated rows. From here the orchard unfurls like a star map anchored in soil.
(Cartographer) Chart the shifting root constellations for the ledgers.
(Glasswright) Embed prisms to catch new paths of light.
Signal your findings down to the commons crew.
node.starfallen_orchard_healer_bower.tex: Curtains of woven vine enclose tables of infusions where orchardists trade breath and pulse. Meteor-steamed basins glow softly, ready to ease overworked hands.
node.starfallen_orchard_healer_bower.cho: (Healer) Distill balm that keeps grafts from scarring.
(Resonant) Hum counterpoints to soothe the resting archivists.
Take a restorative draught and rejoin the rows.
Deliver cooled balms to the sharecrop table.
node.starfallen_orchard_glass_lattice.te: Glass threads stretch between meteor stakes, each strand shimmering with captured recollections. Apprentices etch glyphs into the lattice to guide future harvests.
node.starfallen_orchard_glass_lattice.ch: (Glasswright) Tune the capillaries so memories flow evenly.
(Cartographer) Weave a star-path into the lattice for future pickers.
Archive a gleaming story for the commons jars.
Follow cooling troughs back to the meteor cradle.
node.starfallen_orchard_story_graft.text: A living arbor waits with a hollow branch, ready to accept a sliver of your true name. Orchard keepers steady the grafting knives, eyes bright with the promise of shared memory.
node.starfallen_orchard_story_graft.choi: Plant a graft bearing your true name and share its charge.
Trace the new graft's pulse and promise to return.
Step away before the branch can claim you.
node.starfallen_orchard_graft_recovery.t: Lanternfruit dim to a gentle glow as keepers bandage your new graft, weaving its pulse into yours. Cooling vapors and annotated ledgers surround a circle of resting orchardists.
node.starfallen_orchard_graft_recovery.c: (Story-Graft) Spend your graft charge to borrow a memory about the commons steward.
(Cartographer) Compare your new graft lines with the grove's star-map.
(Healer) Check the graft for safe circulation.
Carry your renewed resolve to the commons.
node.starfallen_orchard_sharecrop_common: A ring of tables laden with memory fruit forms the Sharecrop, each offering labeled for public use. Neighbors and travelers arrive in turn, ready to plant and borrow stories in trust.
Contribute your gathered fruit to inaugurate the commons.
(Resonant) Lead a broadcast so every graft echoes the invitation.
(Cartographer) Plot rotation schedules to keep the commons balanced.
(Quiet Ledger 1+) Dedicate ledger grants to expand the sharecrop stores.
(Freehands 1+) Organize a gleaner network to share fruit with distant crews.
Slip away toward the saltglass expanse with new recollections.
Dedicate the memory harvest to the Orchard Accord infrastructure and oversee it.
node.ending_sharecrop_of_stories.text:
You publish the orchard's ledgers, turning every graft into a documented community promise.
Rotating crews tend the memory fruit, logging who watered, who harvested, and who shared.
Stories ripen into public resource rather than private archive.
node.ending_sharecrop_of_stories.title: The Sharecrop of Stories
node.ending_amnesty_of_names.text:
Your amnesty charter ripples through the Startways, stamped by every ledger you petitioned.
Travelers line up to reclaim forgotten names or try on new ones without whispers trailing them.
Registrars now simply note the change and pass the quills along.
node.ending_amnesty_of_names.title: Amnesty of Names
node.ending_unshattered_gale.text:
You stay to recalibrate each gust frame along the Cloud-Burrow warrens.
Wind-mole crews queue for your nod before launching, the updraft braided steady and low.
The cooperative posts your rota beside the tool hooks, marking you as the keeper of calm breezes.
node.ending_unshattered_gale.title: Unshattered Gale
node.ending_shade_treaty.text:
You settle the Treaty of Moving Shade beneath the caravan council's mirrored canopy.
Walking cities now align their shadows by shared schedule, cooling routes without tribute demanded.
Merchants wave the signed prisms, a treaty maintained by habit instead of heroics.
node.ending_shade_treaty.title: Treaty of Moving Shade
node.ending_living_wake.text:
You turn the amber barges into a standing wake for anyone departing the docks.
Neighbors bring lanternbread and names to share, weaving every farewell into the tide.
By week's end the procession runs itself, held together by the quiet cues you leave behind.
node.ending_living_wake.title: The Living Wake
node.ending_mooring_mediator.text:
You hang up your envoy sigils and take the Aeol rota seat above the moorings.
Each dawn you tune stormglass drums so incoming pilots stagger themselves instead of colliding.
When gusts snap cables, wardens call for the mediator, not the traveler you once were.
node.ending_mooring_mediator.title: Mooring Mediator
node.ending_market_steward.text:
You file the steward rota you drafted and stay to pilot the first market shift.
Petitioners cycle through benches you rebalanced, clerks rotating before tempers fray.
By evening the Root Assembly posts your schedule as standard practice.
node.ending_market_steward.title: Market Steward Rotation
node.ending_galleria_steward.text:
You convert your maintenance map into a public roster for the Prism galleria lifts.
Vendors sign up for shared upkeep instead of bribed shortcuts, the rota chiming on open display.
Apprentices wave you toward the coordinator's desk you now occupy.
node.ending_galleria_steward.title: Galleria Civic Cooperative
node.ending_freehands_regatta.text:
You assemble the Freehands skiffs you cached in the grotto and lead them into the mist.
Run captains take your signals, ferrying migrants and cargo through lanes you just cleared.
By the next tide the regatta charter bears your notes for whoever captains tomorrow.
node.ending_freehands_regatta.title: Freehands Mist Regatta
node.ending_cloud_cooperative.text:
You stay behind on the Cloud-Burrow balconies to organize the coop glideway.
Families rotate watch on the tethered baskets, following the schedule you scribed on wind-proof slate.
The updraft mutters your guidelines every time a newcomer clips in.
node.ending_cloud_cooperative.title: Cloud-Burrow Balcony Cooperative
node.ending_saltglass_wayfinder.text:
You lock your dune charts into the Saltglass co-op chest and claim the night shift.
Caravan captains queue for your mirrored signals, gliding through shade corridors without tribute.
The ledger lists you simply as Wayfinder on duty.
node.ending_saltglass_wayfinder.title: Saltglass Wayfinder
node.ending_shed_market_retirement.text:
You hang your final borrowed mask above the bazaar and settle into the rotation desk.
Molting patrons check in for husks and histories, trading favors you reconcile without fuss.
By closing bell the Quiet Ledger stamps you as permanent steward of the shed stalls.
node.ending_shed_market_retirement.title: Shed Market Rotation Keeper
node.ending_rainchain_hostel.text:
You catalog bunk chits and hang fresh rainchain towels as ferries roll through.
Travelers swap tokens for dry hammocks under the steady rhythm you keep.
The hostel hums without fuss because you stay to mind the roster.
node.ending_rainchain_hostel.title: Rainchain Hostel Steward
node.ending_root_night_auditor.text:
After hearings close you balance the petitions ledger by lanternlight.
Clerks slide you quiet nods while you reconcile favors into open access notes.
By dawn, the market trusts your calm sums more than any speech.
node.ending_root_night_auditor.title: Night Auditor of Roots
node.ending_prism_liftkeeper.text:
You take the night desk, tuning prism lifts to the cadence of working crews.
Vendors bring you coilbread while you pencil every shared ride onto the public slate.
The galleria lights stay even because you keep the rota honest.
node.ending_prism_liftkeeper.title: Prism Liftkeeper
node.ending_saltglass_waystation.text:
You chalk mirrored arrows into the dune shelters and listen for caravan bells.
Night caravans coast in on your signals, trading gossip for cool shade.
The waystation ledger bears your initials beside every safe arrival.
node.ending_saltglass_waystation.title: Saltglass Waystation Warden
node.ending_moon_eel_guest.text:
You settle in the ribcage hosthouse, annotating tide diaries between potluck shifts.
Residents drift through to borrow guest marks and leave baskets of brined sweets.
The suburb hums with gentle courtesy under your watch.
node.ending_moon_eel_guest.title: Moon-Eel Guest Curator
node.ending_wake_candle_warden.text:
You stand the middle watch of the wake barges, trimming wicks before each procession.
Mourners breathe easier knowing you log who needs a lantern and who can rest.
The river glows steady because you keep the candles in quiet rotation.
node.ending_wake_candle_warden.title: Wake Candle Warden
node.ending_bazaar_maskbinder.text:
You hang each borrowed face back on its hook and record the stories tied to it.
Visitors leave new masks with consent slips you seal in lacquer.
The gallery becomes a calm exchange because you stay to tend every persona.
node.ending_bazaar_maskbinder.title: Maskbinder in Residence
node.ending_cocoon_host_caretaker.text:
You make tea in the predawn hush and chart who wakes in which cocoon.
Travelers easing between selves find their blankets warmed and names spelled right.
The hostel keeps its gentle rhythm under your steady shift.
node.ending_cocoon_host_caretaker.title: Cocoon Hostel Caretaker
node.ending_freehands_dispatch.text:
You claim a stool beside the cache ledger, logging every cord and salve that leaves.
Couriers swing by for your updated lists before sprinting into the dunes.
Relief routes stay supplied because you keep the dispatch drumbeat.
node.ending_freehands_dispatch.title: Freehands Dispatch Coordinator
node.ending_canal_common_tide.text:
You draft a tide charter that stitches Aeol departure bells to Freehands relief runs.
Couriers now launch in alternating waves, sharing canals without jostled hulls.
The charter posts on both piers as a plain-signed schedule anyone can keep.
node.ending_canal_common_tide.title: Common Tide Charter
node.ending_shared_ledger_loop.text:
You merge Root Assembly dispatch notes with Quiet Ledger reimbursements.
Clerks swap tablets through your new loop, cross-crediting aid before disputes can bloom.
Routes stay funded because you normalized the cycle.
node.ending_shared_ledger_loop.title: Shared Ledger Loop
node.ending_balcony_safe_concord.text:
You publish a concord that pairs Aeol rosters with balcony stewards on every shift.
Couriers and residents clip the same safety charms before stepping onto windlines.
The burrow's glideways hum with mutual check-ins instead of flinches.
node.ending_balcony_safe_concord.title: Balcony Safety Concord
node.ending_prism_light_commons.text:
You unlock the prism lifts and post a commons pact linking them to guest-law routes.
Cartel stewards rotate upkeep with visiting advocates, their signatures all on one slate.
Lifts chime open to anyone carrying the new rota token.
node.ending_prism_light_commons.title: Prism Light Commons
node.ending_migrant_kithhouse.text:
You circulate the kithhouse accord tying rest decks across the hubs to shared care.
Quiet Ledger stewards and Assembly hosts share pantry tallies on the same board.
Travelers find a ready bunk anywhere the accord seal hangs.
node.ending_migrant_kithhouse.title: Migrant Kithhouse Accord
node.ending_orchard_accord.text:
You braid the orchard's memory fruit harvest into a public conduit, the Orchard Accord.
Prism roots, tidal pumps, and Quiet Ledger grants now feed every hub's archive without gatekeepers.
Families queue beneath the meteor glass to draw shared memories like clean water.
node.ending_orchard_accord.title: The Orchard Accord
node.ending_keeper_of_passways.text:
You accept the steward's ledgers and move into the compass stem that threads every Startways arch.
Two factions' runners brief you each shift as you balance their requests against the tide of travelers.
Routes now whisper of the Keeper of Passways, a post anyone might inherit if they match your quiet balance.
node.ending_keeper_of_passways.title: Keeper of Passways
node.singing_depths_entry.text:
You descend through shafts of crystalline light into a vast natural amphitheater where the very stones seem to breathe with ancient music. The air shimmers with harmonics that make your bones resonate—this place has been singing for millennia, waiting for someone to understand its song.

Bioluminescent moss traces intricate patterns across the walls, pulsing brighter whenever the deep harmonies crescendo from the depths below. You sense this is more than mere cave decoration—the moss responds to the crystal formations like a living musical score.
node.singing_depths_entry.title: The Singing Depths Entry Chamber
node.singing_depths_entry.choice.0.text: (Deep-Listener) 'I can hear the song calling to me...' — Attune to the cavern's ancient resonance.
node.singing_depths_entry.choice.1.text: 'The moss pattern... it's showing me the way.' — Follow the living light deeper underground.
node.singing_depths_entry.choice.2.text: (Healer) 'These frequencies... they're healing the stone itself.' — Study the therapeutic harmonics.
node.singing_depths_entry.choice.3.text: 'These symbols... they're not carved. They're grown.' — Examine the living crystal script.
node.singing_depths_entry.choice.4.text: 'I'm not ready for this place yet.' — Return to prepare for the depths.
node.singing_depths_resonance_chamber.te: A vast domed cavern where stalactites and stalagmites form a natural organ. Each formation vibrates with specific tones, creating complex harmonies that seem to carry meaning beyond mere sound.
node.singing_depths_resonance_chamber.ch: (Deep-Listener) Attempt to decode the harmonic message.
(Echo-Attuned) Harmonize with the chamber to amplify the resonance.
Study the acoustic properties for architectural insights.
Venture toward the sound of underground water.
node.singing_depths_moss_tunnels.text: Narrow passages wind through the rock, their walls carpeted with glowing moss that responds to sound with cascading waves of light. The air is thick with spores that tingle on your skin.
node.singing_depths_moss_tunnels.title: Bioluminescent Moss Tunnels
(Healer) Collect moss samples for medicinal research.
Follow the brightest moss trail deeper underground.
(Scout) Map the tunnel network for future expeditions.
Create a light pattern to communicate with the moss.
node.singing_depths_healing_pools.text: Natural pools filled with mineral-rich water vibrate with healing frequencies. Steam rises carrying medicinal vapors, and the pools' edges are lined with crystalline formations that amplify the therapeutic effects.
node.singing_depths_healing_pools.title: Resonant Healing Pools
node.singing_depths_healing_pools.choice: (Healer) Establish a field hospital using the pools' properties.
Immerse yourself in the healing waters.
(Crystal-Shaper) Shape resonance crystals to contain the healing properties.
node.singing_depths_crystal_gardens.text: Vast caverns where crystals grow like strange flowers, each one singing a unique note. The formations shift slowly, creating ever-changing melodies as they grow and interact with each other.
node.singing_depths_crystal_gardens.choi: (Crystal-Shaper) Guide the growth of new crystal formations.
Harvest singing crystal fragments for study.
(Deep-Listener) Record the crystal symphony for preservation.
node.singing_depths_grand_cathedral.text: The largest chamber in the depths, with crystal formations reaching hundreds of feet toward a natural dome. The acoustics here can amplify a whisper to be heard throughout the entire cavern system.
node.singing_depths_grand_cathedral.choi: (Deep-Listener) Conduct the Grand Symphony of the Depths.
Establish this as a meeting place for all underground dwellers.
Use the amplification to send messages to the surface.
After hours of careful listening, you've compiled a mosaic of fears, hopes, and conflicting interests. The elderly spice-seller worries her trade routes will shift with the seasons. Young clerks whisper about opportunities for advancement if the old systems change. Petitioners from distant islands carry urgent requests that could be stranded if coordination fails.

Your People-Reader abilities reveal the deeper truth: everyone knows change is coming, but no one trusts the others to change fairly. The Seasonal Compact isn't just about timing—it's about who gets to control the future.

'You've been listening well,' says a clerk, approaching with a knowing smile. 'Would you like to present these findings, or do you have other plans?'
'I need to present this to the Assembly. The people's voices must be heard.'
'These testimonies reveal a deeper crisis. I need to investigate the root cause.'
'The real power brokers aren't here. I need to find the ones making the actual decisions.'
'Each faction needs to hear what the others are really thinking.' — Become a mediator.
node.singing_depths_first_communion.text:
As you open your mind to the depths' ancient song, the crystalline formations around you pulse with recognition. The music isn't random—it's a conversation that has waited centuries for someone who could hear both sides.

"Welcome, Echo-Attuned," whispers a voice like wind through crystal chimes. "We are the last guardians of the Deep Resonance, and our time grows short. The surface world's discord threatens to shatter what we protect here."

You realize you're not just exploring a cave—you've stumbled into a crisis that could determine the fate of two worlds.
node.singing_depths_first_communion.choi: 'Tell me what threatens this place. I want to help.'
'What exactly are you protecting down here?'
'I came seeking knowledge, not to choose sides in ancient conflicts.'
node.singing_depths_moss_revelation.text:
Following the moss deeper into the caverns, you discover it's not just decoration—it's a living communication network connecting every crystal formation in the depths. The moss pulses with messages traveling at the speed of light, coordinating the great harmonic symphony that keeps this realm stable.

Sudenly, the moss flares brilliant red. Something is wrong. Deep in the network, you sense panic, discord... and approaching danger from the surface world.
node.singing_depths_moss_revelation.choi: Touch the moss network to receive its urgent message.
Follow the strongest pulse to find the source of the disturbance.
Try to calm the moss network with gentle harmonics.
node.singing_depths_healing_discovery.te:
Your healer's instincts prove correct—the crystal formations aren't just making music, they're performing a continuous healing ritual on a massive scale. The entire cave system is one enormous medical symphony, maintaining the health of something vast and vital.

As you examine the patterns more closely, you realize with growing awe and horror that the depths are healing the world itself. Every discord in the surface lands, every war, every breaking of harmony—it all creates wounds that these crystals work tirelessly to mend.

But now you can hear it: the healing song is breaking down. There are too many wounds, arriving too fast.
node.singing_depths_healing_discovery.ch: 'I need to learn this healing technique to help from the surface.'
'Show me the source of these wounds. I want to stop them at the root.'
'What would happen if the healing song stopped completely?'
node.singing_depths_ancient_language.tex:
The symbols you thought were carved into the crystal walls reveal themselves to be something far more remarkable—they're alive, growing and shifting like crystalline vines that write themselves. This is the written form of the Deep Resonance, a language that exists in three dimensions and grows through time.

As you watch, new words bloom across the walls: 'Surface-walker... you read the deep script... we have waited long... time grows short... will you carry our words above?'

You're witnessing the birth of a message that could change everything—if you can learn to read it fully.
node.singing_depths_ancient_language.tit: The Script of Stone and Light
node.singing_depths_ancient_language.cho: 'I'll learn your language. Teach me to read the deep script.'
'What message do you need me to carry to the surface?'
'I'll help, but first I need to understand what's really happening here.'
node.singing_depths_guardian_council.tex:
You're led through passages of living crystal to a vast chamber where the last three Crystal Guardians maintain their eternal watch. Each appears as a fusion of humanoid form and crystalline growth—ancient beings who chose to become one with the depths to preserve them.

'Surface-dweller,' speaks the eldest, her voice like distant thunder, 'your world's conflicts create psychic wounds that poison the resonance. Wars, betrayals, broken trusts—they echo down to us and corrupt our healing songs. If we cannot cleanse them, both our worlds will fall to discord.'

'But you...' adds another guardian, 'you carry the echo of peace. You could be the bridge we need.'
node.singing_depths_guardian_council.cho: 'Make me a Guardian too. Let me join your eternal watch.'
'I'll work from the surface to heal the conflicts at their source.'
'Teach me to hear these wounds so I can guide others to heal them.'
node.crystalline_reaches_edge.text: Standing stones of living crystal hum with power at the entrance to an ever-shifting maze. The formations grow visibly, creating new pathways while sealing others with melodic chimes.
node.crystalline_reaches_edge.title: Crystal Threshold
node.crystalline_reaches_edge.choice.0.t: (Crystal-Shaper) Shape an opening through the crystal barrier.
node.crystalline_reaches_edge.choice.1.t: (Scout) Find a natural passage between the formations.
node.crystalline_reaches_edge.choice.2.t: Study the patterns of crystal growth.
node.crystalline_reaches_edge.choice.3.t: Wait and watch for the crystals to naturally shift.
node.crystalline_reaches_central_plaza.t: A circular clearing where towering crystal spires resonate in harmony. The ground is inlaid with crystalline paths that pulse with different colored lights, each leading to different districts of the reaches.
node.crystalline_reaches_central_plaza.c: (Crystal-Shaper) Conduct the crystal symphony to reveal hidden paths.
Follow the blue crystal path to the memory vaults.
Follow the red crystal path to the forges.
Follow the green crystal path to the living gardens.
Follow the gold crystal path to the treasury.
Approach the central spire to speak with the Crystal Singers.
node.crystalline_reaches_memory_vaults.t: Vast chambers filled with memory crystals that store experiences, knowledge, and emotions. Each crystal glows with stored life moments, creating a library of living experiences.
node.crystalline_reaches_memory_vaults.c: (Crystal-Shaper) Shape a new memory crystal to store your experiences.
Study the ancient memory crystals for historical knowledge.
(Memory-Keeper) Organize and catalog the memory crystals.
Touch a crystal to experience a stored memory.
Workshops where Crystal Singers shape raw crystal into tools, weapons, and artifacts. The forges themselves are living crystals that respond to the crafter's intent and emotion.
Forge a crystal tool for your journey.
Study the singing properties of shaped crystals.
Crystalline trees and plants that photosynthesize light itself, creating a garden where crystal flowers bloom with captured starlight and crystal fruits store pure illumination.
(Light-Bender) Focus sunlight to accelerate crystal plant growth.
Rest in the peaceful glow of the crystal gardens.
node.singing_depths_heart_revelation.tex:
The ancient Guardian's eyes shimmer with crystal tears as she reveals the truth: 'This realm exists to heal the wounds that surface conflicts tear in the world's harmony. Every war above sends tremors through the foundations of reality. We sing the healing songs to prevent complete collapse.'

She gestures toward the living walls. 'But the damage is accelerating faster than we can repair it. The surface world may not survive another generation of such discord unless something changes.'

The weight of this revelation settles on your shoulders like a mantle of responsibility.
node.singing_depths_heart_revelation.cho: 'I understand now. What can I do from the surface to help?'
'Then I'll stay and learn to be a Guardian myself.'
'There must be another way—one that doesn't require such sacrifice.'
node.singing_depths_surface_mission.text:
The Guardian nods gravely. 'You would carry our song to the surface, becoming a bridge between worlds. It is a path few can walk—you must learn to speak peace while conflict rages around you.'

She places a resonant crystal in your palm. 'This will help you remember the deep harmonies when surface cacophony threatens to drown them out. But know this: once you become a peacemaker, you can never again take sides in war.'

The crystal hums softly against your skin, already changing how you perceive the world.
node.singing_depths_surface_mission.choi: Accept this sacred responsibility and prepare to return to the surface.
'I need more time to understand what this truly means.'
node.singing_depths_empathy_training.tex:
The Guardian leads you to a chamber where the walls pulse with the emotions of surface dwellers. You feel the fear of farmers during raids, the desperate courage of soldiers, the grief of those who've lost loved ones to conflict.

'Every surface emotion echoes here,' she explains as you struggle not to be overwhelmed. 'To heal, you must first understand the depth of the wounds. Touch the wall and let yourself feel their pain—only then can you learn to transmute it.'

The experience is intense, but gradually you begin to distinguish between the different emotional currents.
node.singing_depths_empathy_training.cho: Embrace the full depth of surface suffering to truly understand.
Focus on the healing techniques rather than the pain itself.
'This is too much. I can't carry all this suffering.'
Use your newfound empathy to return to the surface world.
Return to the surface world with your new understanding.
node.singing_depths_wound_source.text:
As you open yourself fully to the pain flowing from the surface, you begin to see the underlying patterns. Most conflicts aren't born from genuine disagreement—they stem from fear, misunderstanding, and the inability to truly hear one another.

A vision forms in the crystal walls: you see how a simple trade dispute escalated into warfare because neither side could bridge the gap between their different ways of communicating. The real enemies are not the people themselves, but the barriers that prevent authentic connection.

'Now you see,' the Guardian whispers. 'The healing begins not with stopping the fighting, but with teaching people how to truly listen.'
node.singing_depths_wound_source.title: The Source of All Wounds
'Teach me how to break down those barriers of communication.'
'I want to learn the healing songs that can bridge any divide.'
Return to the surface immediately with this knowledge.
node.singing_depths_language_lessons.tex:
The Guardian teaches you the deep script—not just the written symbols, but the emotional harmonics that underlie all communication. You learn that every language carries the fears and hopes of its speakers, and that true understanding requires hearing not just words, but the feelings beneath them.

'When surface dwellers cannot understand each other, it's often because they're speaking from different emotional states,' she explains as glowing symbols dance in the air around you. 'Fear speaks one language, hope another. Learn to translate between these emotional dialects, and you can bridge any divide.'

The knowledge settles into your mind like a new sense awakening.
node.singing_depths_language_lessons.cho: Master this art and become a professional mediator.
Learn to record and preserve these communication techniques.
Prepare to teach others this universal language.
node.singing_depths_healing_training.tex:
The healing songs are more complex than you imagined—they're not just melodies, but entire symphonies of emotional restoration. You learn how specific harmonic patterns can dissolve anger, how rhythm can rebuild trust, and how silence itself can create space for understanding.

The Guardian demonstrates by singing to a withered crystal formation. Under her song, it begins to bloom with renewed light, its fractures healing and its surface becoming smooth again. 'Emotional wounds follow similar patterns,' she explains. 'But the healing must come from within—the song merely provides the conditions for natural restoration.'

Your voice begins to carry new harmonic qualities as the training progresses.
node.singing_depths_healing_training.cho: Focus on learning to heal traumatic memories.
Learn to create healing environments for groups.
Study the theoretical foundations behind the healing songs.
node.singing_depths_crystal_workshop.tex:
Within this workshop, crystal formations grow under guided harmonies. The Guardian shows you how to shape living crystal with song, creating instruments that can store and amplify healing vibrations. The work requires both technical precision and deep emotional attunement.

'Each crystal remembers the song that shaped it,' she explains as you watch her coax a new formation from raw crystal seed. 'Shape them with healing intent, and they become tools for restoration. Shape them with malice, and they become weapons. The crystal merely amplifies what the shaper truly feels.'

The implications are both inspiring and sobering.
node.singing_depths_crystal_workshop.cho: Create healing crystals to take to the surface.
Learn to grow crystal instruments for teaching harmony.
Study the dangerous applications to understand their prevention.
node.singing_depths_apocalypse_vision.te:
The Guardian reluctantly shows you the vision she most fears—what would happen if the healing songs fell silent. Crystal formations throughout the chamber show scenes of devastation: surface wars spiraling beyond all control, reality itself beginning to fracture under the weight of unhealed wounds, landscapes twisted by the emotional violence of eternal conflict.

'This is why we cannot simply withdraw our protection,' she says as the visions fade. 'But maintaining the songs forever is also unsustainable—we need surface dwellers to learn harmony themselves, or this realm will eventually exhaust itself trying to heal wounds that are constantly reopened.'

The urgency of finding a better solution becomes clear.
node.singing_depths_apocalypse_vision.ch: 'Then I'll dedicate my life to teaching surface harmony.'
'There must be a way to make the healing self-sustaining.'
'What if we could teach the songs to representatives from every faction?'
node.crystalline_reaches_hidden_grove.te:
Your scouting skills reveal a passage between two massive crystal formations, leading to a hidden grove where wild crystals grow in their natural state. Unlike the cultivated formations elsewhere, these crystals pulse with uncontrolled power, their songs discordant yet hauntingly beautiful.

Among the wild growths, you discover the remains of an ancient crystal-shaper's workshop. Tools of impossible delicacy lie scattered among formations that defy conventional understanding. Clearly, someone once experimented with techniques far beyond current knowledge.
node.crystalline_reaches_hidden_grove.ch: Study the ancient tools to learn lost techniques.
Attempt to harmonize with the wild crystal songs.
Carefully harvest some of the wild crystal for research.
Map this location for future expeditions.
node.crystalline_reaches_harmonic_chambe:
As you begin conducting the harmonies within the crystal formations, their individual songs begin to synchronize. The entire grove transforms into a massive musical instrument, with each crystal formation contributing its voice to an ever-growing symphony.

The music reveals hidden pathways between the formations and causes new crystals to emerge from the ground. You realize you've awakened something ancient—a living composition that has been waiting centuries for someone with the skill to conduct it properly.

The symphony builds to a crescendo that opens a passage deeper into the crystal maze.
Follow the newly opened passage to its destination.
Try to record the complete symphony for preservation.
Use the awakened formations to create a teaching facility.
The passage leads to a vast chamber where thousands of memory crystals float in perfect formation, each one containing the experiences and knowledge of ancient crystal-shapers. As you approach, they begin to resonate in response to your presence, offering to share their accumulated wisdom.

You realize this is the true treasure of the Crystalline Reaches—not just the crystals themselves, but the living library of everyone who ever mastered their secrets. The crystals seem eager to find a new keeper worthy of preserving their knowledge for future generations.
Accept the role of Archive Keeper and dedicate your life to this knowledge.
Learn what you can and return to share it with others.
Search for knowledge about crystal healing techniques.
node.underground_canal_junction.text:
The glowing canal opens into a junction where several waterways converge. Ancient carved symbols mark passages leading in different directions, while bioluminescent organisms provide gentle illumination throughout the network.

This seems to be a major transit hub for the underground systems, with currents flowing toward different parts of the archipelago.
node.underground_canal_junction.title: Underground Canal Junction
node.underground_canal_junction.choice.0: Follow the canal toward the Root Assembly territories.
node.underground_canal_junction.choice.1: Take the passage that leads toward the surface docks.
node.underground_canal_junction.choice.2: Explore the passage marked with crystal symbols.
node.elevated_grotto_chamber.text:
Climbing the phosphorescent roots brings you to a higher chamber with natural windows carved by centuries of water flow. From here, you can see the broader network of caverns and passages stretching throughout the underground.

The elevated position provides multiple routes forward, each leading toward different parts of the archipelago.
node.elevated_grotto_chamber.title: Elevated Grotto Chamber
node.elevated_grotto_chamber.choice.1.te: Follow the passage toward crystalline formations.
node.elevated_grotto_chamber.choice.2.te: Take the upward path toward the surface.
node.prism_workshop_level.text:
The maintenance stairs lead to a working level where crystal artisans shape prisms and mirrors. The workshops hum with activity as light is bent, focused, and redirected through an intricate network of optical devices.

Several passages lead from here to different parts of the Cartel's operations and beyond.
node.prism_workshop_level.title: Prism Workshop Level
node.prism_workshop_level.choice.0.text: Visit the main Cartel administrative offices.
node.prism_workshop_level.choice.1.text: Follow the light conduits toward the central nexus.
node.prism_workshop_level.choice.2.text: Take the service tunnel toward the Root Assembly areas.
node.prism_workshop_level.choice.3.text: Return to the main galleria below.
node.prism_administrative_hub.text:
The administrative center of Prism Cartel operations buzzes with clerks managing trade routes, light allocations, and mirror networks. Maps of the entire archipelago cover the walls, showing the complex web of optical communications that keep the islands connected.

From this central hub, you can access many different regions of the archipelago.
node.prism_administrative_hub.title: Prism Cartel Administrative Hub
node.prism_administrative_hub.choice.0.t: Request transport to the central Startways Nexus.
node.prism_administrative_hub.choice.1.t: Join a caravan heading toward the Root Assembly territories.
node.prism_administrative_hub.choice.2.t: Take passage on a light-ship to the cloud territories.
node.orchard_exit_gateway.text:
Ancient meteor trails carved through the orchard create natural pathways leading back toward the main archipelago. The trails pulse with residual cosmic energy, providing clear navigation routes away from the memory groves.

From here, multiple paths diverge toward different regions of the islands.
node.orchard_exit_gateway.title: Meteor Trail Gateway
node.orchard_exit_gateway.choice.0.text: Follow the bright trail toward the Saltglass Expanse.
node.orchard_exit_gateway.choice.1.text: Take the elevated path toward the Startways Nexus.
node.orchard_exit_gateway.choice.2.text: Return to explore more of the orchard.
node.amber_tides_harbor_exit.text:
The harbor opens to broader channels that flow between the memorial islands and the main archipelago. Tidal currents carry vessels toward different regions, while floating walkways provide passage for those who prefer to stay dry.

Navigation charts mark multiple routes to major population centers.
node.amber_tides_harbor_exit.title: Tidal Harbor Gateway
node.amber_tides_harbor_exit.choice.0.te: Ride the tidal current toward the central nexus.
node.amber_tides_harbor_exit.choice.1.te: Follow the floating walkways toward the cloud territories.
node.shed_market_exit_plaza.text:
At the edge of the Shed Skins district, a transit plaza provides connections to the broader archipelago. Identity verification stations ensure travelers can carry their chosen personas beyond the market boundaries.

Transport options connect to major hubs throughout the islands.

node.shed_market_exit_plaza.choice.0.tex: Board transport to the Startways Nexus.
node.shed_market_exit_plaza.choice.1.tex: Take the route toward the Root Assembly territories.

start.tutorial_first_five.title: First Five Minutes (Tutorial Island)
start.tutorial_first_five.blurb: Step onto the tutorial island and learn how to move, interact, and craft before the wider routes.
start.aeol_envoy.title: Aeol Envoy
start.aeol_envoy.blurb: Carry Aeol dispatch seals to broker storm routes. Diplomacy and gust control keep flights on time.
start.freehands_skyrunner.title: Freehands Skyrunner
start.freehands_skyrunner.blurb: Leap between rigging to supply stranded crews. Fast mutual-aid runs earn Freehands trust.
start.root_scribe.title: Root Assembly Scribe
start.root_scribe.blurb: Keep meticulous ledgers for the Root Assembly. Paperwork and hearings bend guest-law your way.
start.moon_eel_suburb.title: Moon-Eel Suburb
start.moon_eel_suburb.blurb: Swim the moon-eel canals collecting tidal favors. Resonant insight navigates shifting currents.
start.storm_rail.title: Storm Rail Mooring
start.storm_rail.blurb: Ride storm-rails across canyon gustways. Bold maneuvers and Aeol ties cut new lanes.
start.root_depths_staging.title: Root Depths Staging Crew
start.root_depths_staging.blurb: Stage caretaker dives into the root orrery. Steady labor opens sap-lit maintenance routes.
start.shade_walker_outpost.title: Shade-Walker Outpost
start.shade_walker_outpost.blurb: Guide caravans through migrating shade engines. Stealth and wit guard against tribute hunters.
start.cloud_burrow_loft.title: Cloud-Burrow Loft
start.cloud_burrow_loft.blurb: Wake in lofts above the Cloud-Burrow warrens. Airborne logistics favor resonance and glidecraft.
start.amber_barge_quarters.title: Amber Barge Quarters
start.amber_barge_quarters.blurb: Serve aboard memorial barges on the amber tides. Healing rites and archives soothe mourners.
start.market_of_skins_stall.title: Market of Shed Skins Stall
start.market_of_skins_stall.blurb: Run a stall within the Market of Shed Skins. Masks and bargains pivot identities mid-stride.
start.orchard_keeper_hut.title: Orchard Keeper's Hut
start.orchard_keeper_hut.blurb: Tend meteor-grown memories in the orchard huts. Cooperative caretaking knits ledgers and lullabies.
start.singing_depths_diver.title: Singing Depths Diver
start.singing_depths_diver.blurb: Descend into resonant caverns where crystal formations sing with ancient memories. Harmonize with deep echoes to unlock forgotten passages.
start.crystalline_reaches_scout.title: Crystalline Reaches Scout
start.crystalline_reaches_scout.blurb: Navigate the ever-shifting crystal maze where gems grow into new configurations. Shape crystal pathways and harvest singing shards.
start.floating_academy_scribe.title: Floating Academy Chronicler
start.floating_academy_scribe.blurb: Record knowledge in the sky-bound libraries drifting between cloud layers. Manage levitation crystals and catalog aerial discoveries.
start.temporal_garden_keeper.title: Temporal Garden Keeper
start.temporal_garden_keeper.blurb: Tend plants that bloom across multiple time streams simultaneously. Balance past, present, and future growth cycles.
start.shadow_marsh_guide.title: Shadow Marsh Guide
start.shadow_marsh_guide.blurb: Lead travelers through marshes where shadows move independently. Negotiate with shadow merchants and navigate shifting paths.
start.void_beacon_keeper.title: Void Beacon Keeper
start.void_beacon_keeper.blurb: Maintain lighthouse beacons at the edge of reality where stars whisper secrets. Guide void-ships through dimensional currents.
start.tide_warden_acolyte.title: Tide Warden Acolyte
start.tide_warden_acolyte.blurb: Study the sacred tides in temple pools that reflect multiple oceanic realms. Channel tidal forces for healing and prophecy.
